ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 635
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, I forgot about Misty Thicket! Good advice! I brought up my halfing druid here and totally forgot about this place for other classes. No kidding about the
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, I forgot about Misty Thicket! Good advice! I brought up my halfing druid
here and totally forgot about this place for other classes. No kidding about
the guards though. Keep your kills away from them. There's so much to hunt
in Misty that once the guards go off and chase down 1 creature, they aggro
on another, and another, and another and are soon pretty far away from their
posts.

Around level 10 you can start taking out Mooto, gobbo who runs around
buffing the other goblins in the zone. The orc camp in the corner is good
too once you get high enough. Turn in Orc belts to Deputy Budo (in a tower
in the wall) and the warbeads to the sheriff in Rivervale to help your
faction.

You can sometimes sell to the merchants through the windows of their
buildings to save yourself from some of that crouching. :-)

---Windleaf

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tieben, David P [mailto:TiebeDP@...]
> Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 8:01 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 635
>
>
> Hail All,
>
> When I was in my single digit levels I found Misty Thicket to
> be a great
> place as a Bard. There are lots of goblins to kill and you
> can easily solo
> several camps with Selos. Remember to keep turning in the Runnyeye
> Warbeads even if they don't give you xps right away. Eventually after
> killing enough goblins the halflings will warm up to you and
> start giving
> you xps for the beads. The only downsides are you have to get through
> Kithicor Forest, The halfling guards as spastic about
> stealing your kills
> and all that crouching makes your back ache.
>
> I found Misty Thicket to be a great beginning area.
>
> Rylos of E'ci
> Level 18 Bard
>
>
> BTW off topic, but what are some good lvling
> > areas for a
> > semi-twinked (still wanna learn to play the class as
> > intended) lvl 8 bard.
> >
> > Klayan Deathbringer (The Oracle) lvl 50 Necro
> > Celantra (The Oracle) lvl 8 semi-twink Bard
>
